OS: Windows

Protection: Serial Included
Format: Exe

Description:
------------
Inspired by the designers passion for perfection, QuarkXPress 8 complements the way creative professionals work. They strive to do better and constantly improve - employ page-layout and design software developed to help you get there. Work faster and design more with fewer clicks using the modern, intuitive interface of QuarkXPress 8. Build on existing knowledge sharing your print content across media with built-in web and Flash authoring tools. No purchase necessary additional or coding required! Create stunning text and achieve the effects you want with designer-driven typography.
Modern, intuitive interface
New image and pen tools
Integrate images into your layout quickly and seamlessly with QuarkXPress 8.
Intuitively place, scale, rotate, and offset images easily with the new imaging tool to change content without tools or enter numbers in a palette or dialog box. You can even see a preview as you crop an image!
